skills.Name: Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 1.5 and M. Atk. by 1.9. Has a chance of absorbing physical damage inflicted on the enemy as HP.

skills.Name: Robe Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 13.4 when equipped with a robe.

skills.Name: Light Armor Mastery
skills.Description: When equipped with light armor, increases P. Def. by 12.6, Casting Spd. by 90%, Atk. Spd. by 25%, and MP Recovery Bonus by 20%.

skills.Name: Heavy Armor Mastery
skills.Description: When equipped with heavy armor, increases P. Def. by 11.6, Casting Spd. by 71%, and Atk. Spd. by 25%.

skills.Name: Anti Magic
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 20 and Magic Damage Resistance by 5%.

skills.Name: Stun Attack
skills.Description: Attacks the enemy with 42 Power added to P. Atk., inflicting Stun for 5 seconds. Requires a blunt weapon. Over-hit.

skills.Name: Boost Mana
skills.Description: Increases Max MP by 30.

skills.Name: Chant of Life
skills.Description: Fire can destroy, as it can restore broken skin and wounds. Chant a fiery spell to heal you and your party. Restoring HP by 120 Power and 6 HP per second for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Dreaming Spirit
skills.Description: Causes the enemy to sleep for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Frost Flame
skills.Description: Strikes the target with magical cold flame, causing loss of 48 HP per second for 8 seconds.

skills.Name: Chant of Shielding
skills.Description: Increases all party members' P. Def. by 8% for 20 minutes.

skills.Name: Chant of Fire
skills.Description: Increases all party members' M. Def. by 15% for 20 minutes.

skills.Name: Chop of Anger
skills.Description: With rage, chop your target to anger your enemy with 6600 Power.

skills.Name: Life Drain
skills.Description: Call forth dark energy to suck the life energy out of your play thang. Deals 10 Magical Damage and heals for 10%% of the damage dealt. Regains MP.

skills.Name: Summon Team Mate
skills.Description: Summons the selected party member to your location. Requires 1 Summoning Crystal.
